description: Generate a signed URL for a file attachment.

flags.name: --file-attachment-id
flags.validation: Required. Must reference an existing file attachment.

permissions: Allowed if the user has access to the file attachment: when the attachment is not attached to any resource, or when the user is authorized to view the resource the attachment is attached to.
side_effects: Generates a short-lived signed URL for downloading the specified file attachment.
validation_notes: file-attachment-id is required. file-attachment-id must reference an existing file attachment (otherwise validation error: no matching file attachment).
